DOC.brief_title: Prehospital Emergency Care Obstructive Respiratory Emergencies With Use Teleconsultation
DOC.detailed_description: Six ambulance five different Emergency Medical Service ( EMS ) district equip portable telemedicine system . In case acute obstructive , respiratory emergency paramedic use system contact call `` tele-EMS physician '' consent patient obtain . The tele-EMS physician audio-connection EMS team receive vital parameter ( e.g. , ECG , pulse oximetry , non-invasive blood pressure ) real-time . The transmission still picture ( take smartphone ) , 12-lead-ECGs video stream inside ambulance also carry , indicate . The tele-EMS physician support EMS team obtain relevant medical history , diagnosis delegate application medication . This carry bridge time arrival EMS physician less severe case without EMS physician on-scene . The quality prehospital care possible influence initial inhospital phase investigate compare regular EMS .
DOC.criteria: Obstructive , respiratory emergency Verbal consent teleconsultation obtain patient able consent due severity emergency No respiratory emergency Refused consent teleconsultation
